alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Norman; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 9:57PM CST until January 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT....After a lull this evening, blowing snow as winds increase overnight. Near blizzard conditions expected at times, especially in open country with falling snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The central Red River Valley. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact tonight`s commute and the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Norman; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk
